name: Grimaldi Studio legale
bossPosition: Managing Partner at Grimaldi Studio Legale
goal:
The firm has comprehensive and specific experience in European public law, antitrust law, transportation law, liberalisation procedures, mergers and acquisition transactions, and structured finance.
The firm has a deep competence in state aid matters and public procurements, as well as on structural funds and other European financial measures.
The firm provides assistance to its clients in all subjects pertaining to EU law, including their potential public affairs and lobbying activities.
As a result of the skills and professionality acquired, Grimaldi Studio Legale has become a trusted legal advisor for the European Commission and European Parliament, frequently providing assessments and studies in different disciplinary sectors.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, External Relations, Regional Policy, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: The firm is currently following EU initiatives on: capital market union, EFSI, data protection, financial services, consumer protection.
